author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Process all the dressing ingredients together in a food processor, adding just enough lemon juice to sharpen up the flavour.  Add salt and pepper to taste. Toss the endive leaves in the dressing, and serve.
ingredients: 50g/1Â¾oz blue cheese, crumbled (keep some aside to scatter over the endive leaves),  2 tbsp white wine vinegar or cider vinegar,  3 tbsp walnut or hazelnut oil,  3 tbsp sunflower oil,  dash of lemon juice,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to season,  2 endives, leaves only
